member.summary: Sets the default to be used for file-based providers.

member.summary: Sets the FileProvider for file-based providers to a PhysicalFileProvider with the base path.
member.param: The absolute path of file-based providers.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.FileConfigurationExtensions.SetFileLoadExceptionHandler(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfigurationBuilder,System.Action{Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.FileLoadExceptionContext})
member.summary: Sets a default action to be invoked for file-based providers when an error occurs.
member.param: The Action to be invoked on a file load exception.

member.summary: Gets the default to be used for file-based providers.

member.summary: The source settings for this provider.

member.summary: Loads the contents of the file at .
member.exception: If Optional is false on the source and a file does not exist at specified Path.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.FileConfigurationSource
member.summary: Represents a base class for file based .

member.summary: Used to access the contents of the file.

member.summary: The path to the file.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.FileConfigurationSource.Optional
member.summary: Determines if loading the file is optional.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.FileConfigurationSource.ReloadOnChange
member.summary: Determines whether the source will be loaded if the underlying file changes.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.FileConfigurationSource.ReloadDelay
member.summary: Number of milliseconds that reload will wait before calling Load. This helps avoid triggering reload before a file is completely written. Default is 250.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.FileConfigurationSource.OnLoadException
member.summary: Will be called if an uncaught exception occurs in FileConfigurationProvider.Load.

member.summary: Builds the for this source.

member.summary: Called to use any default settings on the builder like the FileProvider or FileLoadExceptionHandler.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.FileConfigurationSource.ResolveFileProvider
member.summary: If no file provider has been set, for absolute Path, this will creates a physical file provider for the nearest existing directory.

member.summary: The that caused the exception.

member.summary: The exception that occured in Load.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.FileLoadExceptionContext.Ignore
member.summary: If true, the exception will not be rethrown.
